template.name: bformg
template.value: <b-form-group id="$name$-group" label="$name$" label-for="$name$" :invalid-feedback="errors.get('$name$')" :state="errors.has('$name$')?false:null" > <b-form-input type="text" id="$name$" v-model="form.$name$" name="$name$" :state="errors.has('$name$')?false:null" trim autocomplete="$name$"></b-form-input> </b-form-group>
